Summary: Aloft Beijing Haidian is near the Haidian district, making it suitable for those needing to be in that area. The hotel has amenities such as internet, a gym, and communal computers.

The Ascott Beijing is located in the CBD, near the Guo Mao subway station, making it convenient for business trips. It offers spacious apartments with amenities like high-speed internet, a business center, and English-speaking staff.
Autumn Garden Hotel offers free internet, and is located within walking distance to the subway station (Hepingmen and Qianmen). The staff speaks English and are very helpful.

The hotel has computers with free internet in the rooms, and is located a 10 minute walk from the Golou metro stop making it convenient for business appointments. The hotel also offers currency exchange and can arrange taxi services, though some reviewers found the taxi rates to be higher than average.

Century Towers Beijing offers apartment-style rooms with amenities such as a full kitchen, dining room, washer/dryer, and a flat-screen TV with cable including English-language channels. The hotel also has a work-out room in the basement.
The hotel has a business center with internet access and staff that speak some English. Money can be exchanged at the front desk, and there is also an ATM just off the lobby.
I am sorry, but the provided reviews do not contain any information about the suitability of this hotel for business travelers.

The Friendship Hotel is a large complex with multiple buildings and amenities such as a business center, restaurants, and a supermarket, and is located near universities and the Zhongguancun High Tech district. It offers internet access (cable or Wifi), and some rooms have a trouser press and desk.

The Guangming hotel offers clean rooms with modern amenities such as LCD TVs with international channels and internet access. It also has a business center with currency exchange services, and is located near the embassy district.

The Beijing Hotel's location is convenient for business, with proximity to a subway stop and the financial district, as well as amenities like fax machines and internet access, though the internet speed has been reported as slow. Some rooms include business suites, and the hotel has a business center, but it may be expensive.

Beijing International Hotel is noted for its central location, proximity to the train station and subway, and business center, though internet access is expensive. Some rooms feature desks and broadband internet access, and executive floors offer tea and coffee in the lounge.

Jade Youth Hostel offers amenities such as free WiFi in the lobby, an internet room, and tour booking services. The hostel also provides services like laundry facilities, currency exchange, and airport pick-up from the Beijing Railway Station.

The hotel offers free internet, but it may not be an easy place to labor over a computer for many hours due to lighting and electric outlet issues, and the location is not near the financial district. Getting taxis is not especially convenient.

The Radegast Hotel CBD Beijing is located in the Central Business District and within walking distance of CBD buildings and a subway station. The hotel rooms have a business desk and free wireless internet.
The Capital Hotel offers a business center, meeting rooms, and is located a short walk from the subway. Some rooms include free internet in the club lounge, while it costs extra otherwise.

China World Hotel is well-maintained and located in the Chaoyang district, connected to the China World Center with office towers and a shopping mall. It has a business center, broadband internet, and meeting facilities, with some rooms offering spacious work areas.
City Hotel is located near the subway, taxi stands, and local restaurants, making it easy to travel around Beijing. It offers clean, no-frills rooms.

The Commune by the Great Wall Kempinski offers villas with spacious rooms suitable for negotiations, and provides a quiet atmosphere. The hotel has conference rooms and offers airport pickup, but staff may have limited English proficiency.

Courtyard 7 offers free internet at the restaurant, and the staff can assist with tasks like printing documents and arranging train tickets. The hotel is located near Nanluoguxiang, which has designer shops, restaurants, and bars.
This hotel offers business center services such as printing and photocopying for a fee. Some rooms offer internet access, though there may be an additional charge.

The Beijing Courtyard Marriott Northeast is a modern, high-rise hotel located about 20 minutes from the airport, with wired internet available at business class hotel prices. It's near a shopping mall and has a business-oriented atmosphere, with amenities like a gym, pool, and breakfast buffet catering to Western and Chinese business travelers.

The hotel has wireless or cable broadband for 120 RMB per day, and club rooms offer free local faxing, free local telephone calls, and one free shirt per day washed and pressed. It is conveniently located near the convention center, downtown, and the airport.

Crowne Plaza Zhongguancun is located near Peking and Tsinghua Universities, and the Olympic "Bird Nest", accessible via a 20-minute subway ride. It's suited for business near Qinghua University and the Qinghua Science Park, with comfortable rooms, fast internet, and a business lunch option at the Rouge Chinese restaurant.

The Crowne Plaza Beijing International Airport Hotel is located near the airport and exhibition center, making it convenient for business travelers. It offers amenities such as a business center, broadband internet in rooms (for a fee), and a free airport shuttle.
The hotel is near a conference center and has spacious rooms with a good working desk set-up. It also offers amenities such as internet access, a business center, and multiple restaurants.

The Crowne Plaza Sun Palace Hotel has new, spacious rooms with modern conveniences, a gym, and an indoor pool. It is located near the third ring road and a subway station, with taxis available, and offers services such as a concierge and English-speaking staff.
The hotel offers free broadband and wireless internet access and is close to the subway. The hotel also has a business center where you can use the computer for a fee.

Days Inn Joiest, Beijing, offers modern, clean rooms with flat-screen TVs, and the reception staff speaks reasonably good English. The hotel is located in a newly built commercial area and has a buffet breakfast.
I am sorry, but the reviews for this hotel do not discuss features relevant to business travelers.

The Doubletree Hilton Beijing offers wireless internet in the lobby and executive lounge access with free breakfast, evening hors d'oeuvres, drinks, and internet. It is located a 10-minute taxi ride from the nearest subway, making it a convenient option for business travelers.
The Empark Grand Hotel offers wired internet access in rooms for a fee, and free wireless in the lobby. It has a gym, pool, and restaurants, as well as a vegas-like mall in the basement.

Fujian Hotel is conveniently located near the 3rd ring road and a mall with a supermarket and food court. It offers amenities suitable for business travelers such as free WIFI, and internet connection and is about 20-30 minutes from the airport.

Gloria Plaza Hotel is a city business hotel with a good location and spacious rooms, aimed mainly at large groups. It is conveniently located near the Beijing railway Station and underground station, with staff that speak English.

The hotel provides dependable Wifi, a business center, and airport pickup/dropoff in Mercedes-Benz S550 sedans. The hotel is attached to another luxury hotel with indoor passage to their lobby and facilities.

The Grand Hyatt Beijing is conveniently located near many American tech companies and offers a great network and desk setup for business travelers. The hotel also has a full-service business center and a Club Level with free laptop use.

The Grand Mercure Hotel Xidan Beijing is conveniently located near Financial Street and Beijing CBD, with easy access to subway lines 1 and 2. It offers Wi-Fi in public areas, a lobby bar with live piano music, and Cantonese cuisine, catering to both business and leisure travelers.

The Grand Millennium Hotel is located in the Central Business District, next to the subway, and a short walk to the World Trade Center. It offers spacious rooms with work desks, free internet, and a business center.

The hotel has business services, including internet access, but some reviewers found the internet expensive and the staff's English proficiency limited. Some rooms have a writing area, and the hotel has function rooms and money exchange services.

The hotel offers complimentary WIFI in renovated superior business rooms and is connected to a shopping complex. It also provides internet access in rooms for a fee and has a business center with internet access.

Harmony Hotel is conveniently located near the Beijing Railway Station and subway, making it easily accessible from the airport via shuttle bus. The hotel offers a business center with internet access and is within walking distance of the Oriental Plaza shopping mall.

Hebei Guest House is a basic courtyard hotel in a traditional Hutong neighborhood, within walking distance of major attractions like the Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square. The hotel can assist in booking transportation, although it may be more expensive than arranging it independently.
Hilton Beijing is recently renovated with modern rooms, a comfortable bed, and spacious bathrooms. The hotel is equipped with a business center, internet access, and an executive lounge.

The Hilton Wangfujing offers amenities such as a 24/7 business center, seamless internet access throughout the hotel, and a printer in each room. It has conference and business facilities, and an executive lounge with free Wi-Fi.

Holiday Inn Lido is near the airport and close to businesses in the Chaoyang district, but not near the subway or malls. It offers laundry service, internet access for a fee, a business club floor, and a variety of restaurants and shops.

Holiday Inn Central Plaza is a well-managed 4-star hotel with excellent service, an efficient staff that speaks English, and internet access in the bedrooms for 90 yuan a day. Some reviewers recommend it for business travelers.
The hotel offers free internet, an executive lounge with free food and drinks, and an executive club floor with free laundry service. It is located near the subway and provides access to cabs.

The hotel is conveniently located near the subway, a local supermarket, and various restaurants including international brands like Pizza Hut. Some rooms have been tastefully renovated with flat screen TVs, and a great breakfast is included in the rate.

Holiday Inn Express Minzuyuan Beijing offers free internet in rooms and in the lobby, computers in the lobby available 24/7, and is located a couple blocks from the subway. Some reviewers mentioned the hotel attracts business travelers and that the rooms have a full desk for paperwork.

Holiday Inn Express Temple of Heaven provides free Wi-Fi, free internet terminals, and is close to a bus line, making it convenient for transportation, though a subway station is not within walking distance. The rooms include a desk and comfortable beds, with breakfast included.
Holiday Inn Express Wangjing is a new hotel close to the airport and next to the Hua Tang Shopping Center. It has modern furniture and amenities, free internet, and includes breakfast.

The Holiday Inn Temple of Heaven offers business rooms on the 14th floor, and a business center (though internet usage incurs a charge). Some reviewers mention the hotel's conference standard facilities, helpful staff for directions, and proximity to a metro station for accessing other parts of the city.
This hotel offers free wi-fi in the lobby and a computer for guest use, but the computer is in Chinese. The staff speaks limited English.

The hotel has Wi-Fi access, and a laptop PC in the lounge for guests to use free of charge. The front desk clerks are happy to provide written instructions that guests can give to a cab driver for their destination.
Hotel G has a business center, free Wi-Fi, and is conveniently located for business or holiday travel. The rooms have ipod docks, and comfortable beds.

Ibis Sanyuan Hotel is located next to the Sanyuanqiao subway station on line 10 and the Airport Express train, providing convenient access to the airport and city center. The hotel offers free internet in the rooms and is near the Novotel Sanyuan Hotel.

The Kunlun Hotel offers executive level rooms with butler service, free food on the top floor, and renovated rooms. It has multiple restaurants and bars, and the staff is generally attentive and professional.

The New Otani Chang Fu Gong Hotel is centrally located on Chang An Avenue, close to the Jianguo Men subway station, Silk Market, and Friendship Store, making it convenient for business and tourist activities. It offers amenities such as a business center, internet access, and a helpful staff, with Japanese management evident in its facilities and services.

The Howard Johnson Paragon is conveniently located opposite the Beijing Railway Station and connected to a shopping mall with restaurants and a supermarket. It offers business services and internet access, though some reviews mention the business center could be improved.
The Huadu Hotel offers business rooms with desks, free internet, and proximity to the International Exhibition Centre and Lufthansa Centre. Some rooms include office supplies and a water dispenser.

Hua Wei Business Appartment Hotel offers apartment-style rooms with amenities such as internet access, laundry facilities, and kitchenettes. The hotel is located in the Xidan shopping area with access to a taxi stand and is a 10-minute walk to the nearest subway.

The Intercontinental Beijing Beichen offers amenities such as executive work desks with stationery, and is located near the National Convention Center. The hotel also has a business center, though internet access is not complimentary.

The Intercontinental Beijing is located in the Financial District and is close to the subway. It offers modern rooms, excellent service, and amenities such as a fitness center, club level with complimentary access to the Club Lounge, and internet access.

Jade Garden Hotel is noted for its location within walking distance to the Forbidden City, Tiananmen Square and shopping districts; some rooms include internet access. Some reviewers mentioned that staff were helpful and could assist with services such as reconfirming flights.

The Jian Guo Hotel is conveniently located near the subway, Silk Market, and the World Trade Center, with in-room broadband internet access and a business center. It offers renovated rooms with a tea/coffee station, and provides a wide selection of breakfast options.
The hotel has a business center, but internet connection is expensive. Some rooms have a water dispenser and the hotel can organize packed breakfasts.

Jinqiao Hotel Apartments offers apartment-style accommodations with kitchens, washing machines, and free internet. The hotel is conveniently located near the train station and provides easy access to local attractions, with on-site amenities such as a supermarket, currency exchange, and taxi service.
Joy City Hotel is located next to a shopping mall and close to the subway and airport bus. Some rooms include kitchenettes, and free internet access is available.

The JW Marriott Beijing is a modern hotel located in the CBD area, near the China World Trade Centre, with well-equipped rooms including a work desk, high-speed internet, and a technology advisory service. It offers amenities such as a business center, executive lounge, and meeting facilities, making it suitable for business travelers.
The hotel offers free broadband internet in rooms and a business center. Some rooms have a computer.
Kelly's Courtyard offers free wireless, and is located a five minute walk to the main street with buses and taxis. The staff can assist with travel arrangements.

The Kempinski Hotel is conveniently located for business travelers, only 30 minutes from the airport and close to offices, with well-equipped rooms and multiple restaurants. It also offers amenities such as a business center, and is connected to a shopping center with various service businesses.

The hotel offers spacious rooms with comfortable beds, large marble bathrooms with separate showers and tubs, and free wired internet. It's conveniently located near shopping areas and has a business center, though some reviews mention the internet speed can be slow.

Lee Gardens Service Apartment Beijing offers spacious apartments with kitchens and amenities like washer/dryers, catering to longer stays, and includes a business center and gym. Its location is near the Wangfujing shopping area and subway, providing convenient access to other parts of the city.

The Legendale Hotel in Beijing offers spacious, fully-equipped rooms with amenities such as a flat-screen LCD, DVD player, and large bathroom. It's located near a shopping center and dining options, with convenient access to the Forbidden City, Tiananmen Square, and the subway.
The Loong Palace has business facilities, and is located within easy reach of high tech districts. Club rooms are spacious and clean.

The Luxury Serviced Residence offers apartments with kitchens, desks, and free internet, and is located in the Chaoyang district near the embassy area, with access to commercial areas. The front desk staff can assist with translations for business travelers.

The Marco Polo Parkside is located near the technology zone and about 30 minutes by taxi from the city center, with taxis readily available via the doorman. Rooms include free internet, a desk, and a breakfast buffet.
The Marriott West Beijing caters heavily to business travelers with competitive rates. It offers spacious rooms and suites, an executive lounge, and a Bally's Fitness Center.

The Marriott Executive Apartments Beijing is located in the Chaoyang district and offers spacious 2-bedroom apartments with fully equipped kitchens, home cinema systems, and same-day laundry service. It is located near a high-end mall and offers amenities such as a gym, swimming pool, and sauna.

The Marriott City Wall is a large, modern hotel with spacious rooms, comfortable beds, and well-equipped bathrooms, offering amenities suitable for business travelers. It has a business center, an executive lounge with internet access, and is located near the railway station and subway lines for convenient transportation.
The hotel has a business lounge with photocopying and faxing services, and free internet access in the rooms. It is located near the subway, providing convenient access to the city center.
Michael's House offers free internet and a computer for guest use, and the staff can write destinations and guides in both English and Chinese for travelers. The hotel also has a business center.

Motel 268 Wangfujing is located near the Wangfujing shopping area and the Dengshikou subway station, with rooms offering free internet. Some rooms are small and without windows, but larger rooms are available at a higher price.

The New World Hotel is located in the Chaoyang District, near the Chaoyang theater, with easy access to the subway. It is close to Beijing's World Trade Center and offers modern rooms with LCD TVs, a business center, and a breakfast buffet suited for foreigners.

The Nikko New Century Hotel in Beijing is near an exhibition center and offers amenities such as free internet access on the Executive Floor, fax machines, and business center services, but printing is expensive. Some found the rooms comfortable and functional for working, while others noted they were small and in need of renovation.

Novotel Peace Beijing is a Western-friendly hotel with multilingual staff, free WiFi and Apple computers in the lobby, and ethernet access in rooms for a fee. It offers a location near shopping malls, restaurants, and attractions like the Forbidden City, making it suitable for business travelers seeking convenience.

The Novotel Xinqiao offers premier floor rooms in the new wing with free breakfast and internet, as well as free laundry and use of the lounge and meeting rooms. The hotel also has a business center with helpful staff.

Oakwood Residence Beijing offers spacious apartments with fully equipped kitchens, laundry machines, and free WIFI. It is located on the Eastern 3rd ring, close to shopping malls and restaurants, and provides services like breakfast, spa, and a gym.
Orange Hotel is located close to the subway, and taxis are readily available and cheap for transport to the airport. The hotel offers wired and wireless internet in each room.

The Oriental Bay International Hotel is a large hotel with spacious, clean, and comfortable rooms, and offers amenities such as an indoor pool and fitness center. The hotel has a business center with internet access and a conference center.

The Oriental Culture Hotel is described as a 4-star business hotel with modern furnishings, free and fast internet, and helpful staff who speak decent English. Some rooms include a desk, plasma TV, and turn-down service.

The Oriental Garden offers free internet in executive rooms, a business center, and is conveniently located a 10-minute taxi ride from Tian'anmen Square and the Forbidden City. Some found the staff's limited English and primarily Chinese-focused amenities to be a drawback for Western business travelers.

The Marriott Palm Springs Executive Apartments is well-suited for long-term business stays, with spacious, well-decorated rooms and amenities like a gym, internet access, and breakfast. It's located in an upscale apartment compound with easy access to the CBD and airport via the 4th ring road.

Park Hyatt Beijing offers professional staff, concierge services, and fluent English speakers, catering to business travelers' needs. The hotel is located near subway lines 1 and 10, providing convenient access to the city, and features amenities such as work desks, internet access, and meeting facilities.

This hotel has free wired internet in the rooms and free Wi-Fi in the lobby and bar, as well as a business center on the second floor. Rooms have a large desk, and the hotel is located a short taxi ride away from the business district.

The hotel offers free in-room internet, computers, and currency exchange, and is conveniently located near the Pearl Shopping Market. The hotel is a 10-15 minute taxi ride from the city center and Tiananmen Square.

The Plaza Hotel is a modern business hotel with clean, well-furnished rooms, wired and wireless internet, and a business center. It's located on the Third Ring Road, a short taxi ride from major sites and the World Trade Centre.

The Prime Hotel offers free in-room internet, a business center, and is frequented by local businessmen. The hotel is centrally located, close to shopping and attractions, and taxi services are readily available.

The hotel offers complimentary and unrestricted internet, and club rooms on floors 21 and 22 include access to an executive lounge with free breakfast, soft drinks, happy hour with snacks, and internet access with computers and a printer. The hotel is located a short walk from the subway, which provides easy access to the city center.

Qianyuan Hotel is near two subway lines and offers broadband access, making it convenient for transportation and communication. Some rooms have kitchen facilities, and the hotel is located on a street with many restaurants.

Raffles Beijing is located near the subway and provides free wi-fi, making it convenient for business travelers. Some rooms have a separate living area and work area, and the hotel offers business services and personal valets.

The Renaissance Capital Hotel is located in Beijing's Central Business District near the 3rd Ring Road and a subway station. It offers amenities such as a business lounge, spacious work desks in the rooms, and is close to a shopping mall with Western amenities.

The Renaissance Beijing Capital Hotel is positioned as a business hotel with rooms in good condition and offers meeting facilities. It features reliable broadband, a gym, and a pool, with a lounge that provides breakfast, beverages, and happy hour, along with computers for guest use.

The Shangri-La Beijing offers business-friendly amenities such as a mini business center in executive suites, free internet, and a gym, with some rooms having multi-adapter sockets. The hotel is located in the western part of Beijing and is suitable for travelers who need to be in that area.

Kerry Centre is a business hotel in Beijing's CBD, near embassies and the financial district, offering amenities such as broadband access, a business center, and executive level rooms with lounge access; it is conveniently located near the subway. The hotel provides car service to and from the airport and has staff that speak English.
The hotel is largely business focused and provides free high-speed internet in the rooms. The hotel has a business center, and is located in central Beijing.

The Sofitel Wanda Beijing is located in the CBD/Financial district, close to an office, with easy access to taxis and the subway. It offers amenities such as free internet, a business center, and is near shopping centers, restaurants and bars.
The hotel is located close to the Guloudaije subway stop on Line 2, and offers free access to a business center. Additionally, the hotel staff can assist with tasks such as buying a SIM card.
Somerset ZhongGuanCun offers apartments with central air conditioning, and is located near a subway line. The front desk staff is helpful and speaks English.

I am sorry, but the provided reviews do not offer specific details that cater to business travelers. The hotel is a traditional courtyard-style hotel located in a hutong, with traditionally decorated rooms.

The Sunworld Hotel is described as a solid, business-class hotel comparable to a Four Points or Courtyard, with a good location near high-end shops and Tiananmen Square. It offers amenities such as free in-room internet, and the staff is professional, with many speaking English.

The Swissotel Beijing is noted for its convenient location near a subway station and major highways, making it easy to get around the city, and offers amenities important to business travelers such as internet access and a currency exchange service. Some reviewers noted the availability of business services and facilities, while others mentioned the helpfulness of the concierge team for travel advice.

Templeside Deluxe Hutong House offers amenities such as air conditioning, TV, and internet, with good transport connections to shopping centers. The owner speaks excellent English and can provide helpful advice.
The hotel is located a 45-minute drive from the heart of Beijing. It offers amenities such as plasma screens, a private movie theater, spa facilities, a fitness center, and a library.

The Emperor Hotel offers free WiFi, a desk in each room, and is within walking distance of shopping malls and restaurants. Some reviewers mentioned the staff was helpful and efficient, and able to provide assistance such as cash advances.

The Opposite House offers spacious rooms with a large work area, adjustable lighting, and connection leads and sockets. It's located in the Sanlitun area, near embassies, shops, restaurants, and bars.

The Peninsula Beijing is noted for its business-friendly amenities like in-room fax machines, and business center, plus convenient location to shopping. The hotel also offers suites with office spaces and dining tables, and caters to business meetings with ballrooms and breakout rooms.

The Regent Beijing offers free internet, a comfortable working space in each room, and is located close to shopping and tourist destinations. Some reviewers mention business facilities, but others note language barriers with some staff.

The Ritz Carlton Financial Street is located in Beijing's financial district and offers amenities such as high-speed wireless internet, a business center, and a club floor with food and beverage service. Some reviewers recommend it for business travel due to its modern decor and proximity to businesses.

The Ritz-Carlton Beijing is located in a business district, close to the subway, and offers amenities such as business equipment in the rooms, internet access, and a breakfast buffet. The hotel also has a gym and pool.

The St. Regis Beijing is a well-appointed hotel located in the embassy district, making it convenient for business meetings in the Gold and Platinum zones of the city. It offers amenities such as butler service, a business center, and an executive lounge, with some reviewers noting the staff's ability to remember personal preferences, making it a top choice for business travelers.

The Westin Beijing Chaoyang is located in the Chaoyang district, convenient for transport and airport access, with large rooms featuring bright, adjustable lighting, good-sized desks, and reliable Wi-Fi. It also offers an executive lounge, airport transportation, and a location next to a metro stop.

The Westin Beijing Financial Street is located in Beijing's financial district, near regulatory commissions for banking, insurance, and securities, making it convenient for business travelers. The hotel is equipped for business with wireless internet, work desks, and meeting facilities.

The Sunworld Dynasty Hotel (formerly Tianlun Dynasty) offers a business center with internet access, and some rooms have free in-room internet; the Executive Floor provides VIP services like a conference center, receptionist, and English magazines/newspapers. The hotel is centrally located on Wangfujing Street, within walking distance of attractions like the Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square.

Tian Rui Hotel is conveniently located near Wangfujing Street and a subway station, offering amenities such as internet access, an in-room iron and ironing board, and a restaurant with a breakfast buffet. The hotel provides English-speaking staff and is considered Western-friendly.

The Tiantan Hotel offers business services and is located near the Pearl Market. Some reviewers mention it is a typical Chinese business hotel, while others note the staff's limited English proficiency.

Traders Hotel in Beijing is located in the World Trade Center complex, close to the Guamao subway station and the business district, making it convenient for business travelers. The hotel offers amenities such as a gym, spa, and access to facilities at nearby hotels, as well as services catering to business needs, such as internet access and executive floor benefits.

The Traders Upper East hotel is a modern business hotel located in Beijing's new business district, convenient to the airport. It has a gym open until 11pm, internet access, and offers services such as airport pickup and drop-off.
The hotel has a business center with functional facilities and offers high-speed internet in executive rooms. Some rooms have a desk and views of the Forbidden City.

Xi Jiao Hotel is near university sites such as Tsinghua and Peking University, and is accessible via the WuDaoKou subway station on line 13. The hotel has multiple buildings with restaurants, internet, and a front desk that speaks English.
The hotel offers a business service center, foreign exchange facilities, and an ATM in the lobby, with some staff having a good command of English. Rooms include a prive PC and large flatscreen.

Xinyuan Inn offers budget-friendly accommodations with a convenient location near bus routes and within walking distance of some sights, although the subway is a 15-20 minute walk. Breakfast is included, and there is a grocery store nearby.

The XiXI Youyi Hotel is located near the Xidan subway station on Line 1, a main shopping district, and offers spacious rooms. Some reviewers mentioned the convenience of a currency exchange office and the availability of Western and Oriental food.

The Xiyuan Hotel is located near offices, making it suitable for business trips, and offers amenities such as free internet, a work desk, and smooth check-in/check-out. Although primarily geared towards Chinese businessmen, the hotel provides clean rooms and is near a Carrefour supermarket, with some staff speaking English.

This hotel is primarily a business hotel with a business center and Wi-Fi access; it is located in the University District, a 5-minute taxi ride/7-8 minute bus ride to the nearest Underground station. Guests were mostly Chinese conference attendees.
The hotel offers free internet, a computer in each room, and is located close to the train and subway stations. Some rooms have a desk and there is a tour agency in the lobby.
